mapper.select: /* user.selectUser 사용자 정보 조회 */ SELECT lu.USER_ID AS userId , lu.USER_NAME AS userName , lu.USER_GRAD AS userGrade , getCodeName('GRADE',lu.USER_GRAD) AS userGradeName , lu.REG_DATE AS regDate , lu.USER_CODE AS userCode , lu.EMAIL AS email , lu.DEPT_CODE AS deptCode , getCodeName('DEPT',lu.DEPT_CODE) AS deptCodeName , lu.TEAM_CODE AS teamCode , getCodeName('TEAM',lu.TEAM_CODE) AS teamCodeName , lu.TITLE_CODE AS titleCode , lu.USER_TYPE AS userType , lu.IS_ADMIN AS isAdmin , lu.IS_DELETE AS isDelete , lu.THEME AS theme , lu.CONTENT_MODE AS contentMode , lu.WIDTH_MODE AS widthMode , lu.MAIL_CHECK1 AS mailCheck1 , lu.MAIL_CHECK2 AS mailCheck2 , lu.MAIL_CHECK3 AS mailCheck3 , lu.IS_LOCK AS isLock , lu.ROLE_CODE AS roleCode , lu.ORGAID , (select OBJTTX from lab_interface_hr1010 hr1010 where hr1010.OBJTID = lu.ORGAID ) as OBJTTX , lu.TITLCD , (select CDTEXT from lab_interface_hr9001 hr9001 where hr9001.CDVALU = lu.TITLCD and hr9001.CDTYPE = 'TITLCD') as TITL_TXT , lu.LEVLCD , (select CDTEXT from lab_interface_hr9001 hr9001 where hr9001.CDVALU = lu.LEVLCD and hr9001.CDTYPE = 'LEVLCD') as LEVEL_TXT , lu.RESPCD , (select CDTEXT from lab_interface_hr9001 hr9001 where hr9001.CDVALU = lu.RESPCD and hr9001.CDTYPE = 'RESPCD') as RESP_TXT , (select TOBJID from lab_interface_hr1010 hr1010 where hr1010.OBJTID = lu.ORGAID ) as TOBJID , lu.EMSTAT FROM lab_user lu WHERE 1 = 1 AND lu.IS_DELETE != 'Y' AND lu.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
